properties.name: outputAsFilePath
properties.description: Whether to save the output to a specified file path. Uncheck to output as binary data. Note: Binary output is disabled if 'Keep Trimmed Segments' is enabled.

properties.name: outputFilePath
properties.description: The full file path to save the primary trimmed media.

properties.name: outputBinaryPropertyName
properties.description: The name to give the output binary property.

properties.name: inputUseFilePath
properties.description: Use a file path for the input media. Uncheck to use binary data from a previous node.

properties.name: inputFilePath
properties.description: The full file path to the input media file.

properties.name: inputBinaryPropertyName
properties.description: The name of the binary property containing the input media.

properties.name: startTime
properties.description: The time to start the trim from the beginning of the media.

properties.name: endTime
properties.description: The time to end the trim. This defines the end point of the main segment.

properties.name: keepTrimmedSegments
properties.description: If enabled, the parts of the media before the start time and after the end time will also be saved as separate files.
